text: Kenneth Donald Chisholm Turnbull (February 10, 1920 - September 14, 2008) was a Canadian football player who played for the Toronto Argonauts. He won the Grey Cup with them in 1947.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=turnbken001 ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Players of Canadian football from Ontario
